Articles.Content:
Basic question

İf i move directory of KSP how i can make program recognize its NEW directory

This is an easy one: KSP up to the 1.2 pre-release refers to whatever the current directory is when you launch ksp.exe or ksp_64.exe. It doesn't matter where the folder is then, because everything's referred to relative to the current one.

If you fiddle with shortcuts to add parameters and mess with Unity's functionality, make sure you fix shortcuts after you move your KSP folder, such that the Start In setting matches where the game is.

--
i assume updater.exe works same way
